WHAT HAS BEEN HAPPENING

AUTUMN PENSION ROADSHOWS

Our pension advisers, Lemonade, are currently conducting the Annual Pension Roadshow offering pension presentations. There is also an opportunity to book a one-to-one pension review meeting.

The presentations will last approximately 45 minutes and will:

  • Update you on topical pension matters

  • Give you the opportunity to review how your funds have performed

  • Help you understand your options at retirement

There is still availability on the presentation sessions in Edinburgh and Aberdeen - you can book your place via the Academy online booking system.  If you would like a pension review meeting with one of Lemonade’s advisers, please email aam@lemonadereward.com.

RETIREMENT OPTIONS PLANNER

Pension choices at retirement don't have to be confusing.

The Retirement Options Planner helps employees who are approaching retirement or even just thinking of retirement.

Employees can:

  • View and compare their three options (drawdown, annuity and cash-out)

  • Understand when they can afford to retire

  • View how much they will get

  • Get a simple view of all their pension pots

…and much more!
